Course Description: THIS COURSE PROVIDES A SYSTEMATIC AND IN-DEPTH STUDY OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND UNDERLYING RECORDS. SPECIAL ATTENTION IS GIVEN TO THE ELEMENTS COMPOSING WORKING CAPITAL, INVESTMENTS, AND PLANTS ASSETS. ADVISEMENT NOTE: STUDENTS ACHIEVING LESS THAN A GRADE OF "C" IN ACG2011, PRINCIPLES OF ACCOUNTING II, MAY EXPERIENCE ACADEMIC DIFFICULTY IN THIS COURSE.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
